definition: to begin/to initiate/to inaugurate/to start/to create
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
to set a box office record

sentences.english: Taiwans' economic growth has dropped to its slowest rate in 26 years.
sentences.chinese: 臺灣的經濟成長率創下二十六年來的新低點。

sentences.english: Now, as they came to the Pecos River, the wagon hit a big rock.
sentences.chinese: 現在，當他們來到佩科斯里弗，該車創下了大石頭。

sentences.english: Phil Hill takes the checkered flag, setting a new race speed record.
sentences.chinese: 菲爾山取格子旗，創下了新的比賽速度的紀錄。

sentences.english: A central New York man hit the criminal justice trifecta , three arrests in three hours.
sentences.chinese: 紐約一男子在三小時內創下接連被捕三次的記錄。

sentences.english: Many records have been set by people who love to hula hoop.
sentences.chinese: 熱愛搖呼拉圈的人創下了許多紀錄。

sentences.english: China has overtaken US by importing record oil from Saudia arabia.
sentences.chinese: 中國從沙特進口的石油創下記錄，超過了美國。

sentences.english: It was Ovett in particular who helped drive Coe on to new heights.
sentences.chinese: 科勳爵能不斷受到激勵創下新高，尤其要感謝奧維特。

sentences.english: His superiority over his contemporaries was considerable and he held many records for the highest marks ever achieved in competition.
sentences.chinese: 洛加尼斯創下了許多比賽中的最高分紀錄。

sentences.english: During his lifetime, he hit a total of seven hundred fourteen home runs.
sentences.chinese: 在他的一生中，他創下了七百一十四全壘打總數。

sentences.english: The highest increase of Rs 27 per kg has been recorded in Thiruvananthapuram.
sentences.chinese: 特里凡得琅市創下了每公斤27盧比的最高漲幅。

sentences.english: The Crash was the greatest single-day loss that Wall Street had ever suffered in continuous trading up to that point.
sentences.chinese: 這次崩潰創下華爾街在連續交易中的單日最大跌幅。

sentences.english: How does Magnus describe her father's nineteenth-century career?
sentences.chinese: 瑪格納斯如何描述她父親在十九世紀創下的事業？

sentences.english: This month, the franc hit a record high against the euro.
sentences.chinese: 本月，瑞士法郎對歐元的匯率創下新的記錄。

sentences.english: Banks were again the biggest fallers in the region.
sentences.chinese: 銀行股再次創下歐洲股市最大跌幅。

sentences.english: Typhoon Neoguri affected Hong Kong, it broke lots of record .
sentences.chinese: 颱風浣熊襲港，創下多個紀錄。

sentences.english: The young swimmer has set up a new record for the back stroke.
sentences.chinese: 那位年輕運動員創下了仰泳新紀錄。
